function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"High mortality rate, overwhelmed healthcare systems, economic disruption","Mitigation":"Enforcing public health measures, promoting vaccination, early detection and response","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, virtual health consultations","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable demographics","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Influence of fake news on public awareness and decision-making","Impact":"Misinformation, panic, and distrust in official guidance","Mitigation":"Fact-checking, public education, promoting credible sources","Technologies":"AI-powered content analysis, social media monitoring tools","People":"General population, media organizations, public health agencies","Owner":"Fact-checking organizations, social media platforms, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of pandemic on social media users","Impact":"Increased anxiety, stress, and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Mental health support, promoting positive and accurate information, social support networks","Technologies":"Teletherapy platforms, mental health apps, online support communities","People":"Social media users, individuals with pre-existing mental health conditions","Owner":"Mental health professionals, social media platforms, community support organizations"}]}
